channel.title: Mikka's happenings 📒
channel.description: Random thoughts and happenings in my life.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #38
item.description: I just realised I haven’t eaten breakfast yet.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #36
item.description: I did it 😭 aaargh I hate needles

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #35
item.description: Since I have done my bloodtest, it’s time, once again.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #33
item.description: Psychiatrist called and he’ll prescribe me my medications again.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #32
item.description: The pharmacy didn’t receive anything from my psychiatrist. Called my clinic and asked if they could label it as an emergency. I’m currently on half my dosis and don’t have anything for the coming days.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #31
item.description: Bloodtest done, now going to my pharmacy for an emergency

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #30
item.description: I think a positive change is to move away from toxicity and negative spaces. Like I did months ago with some image boards with a negative aura.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #29
item.description: But I want to find happiness.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #28
item.description: I just feel sorry for taking up space in their mind of worries.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #27
item.description: My friends are so nice to me.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #26
item.description: 280 days clean today. I want to make it to 300.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #24
item.description: People close to me want me to live. I’ll try to keep it up.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #23
item.description: But I know I’d upset everyone around me for such a selfish act.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #22
item.description: Contemplating if all my medical issues and psychological issues are really worth even living.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #21
item.description: Sobered up, working on hygiene.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #19
item.description: I feel like I’m a bother to everyone.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #18
item.description: 荷兰语（母语）只有 2300 万人。那并不多。

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #17
item.description: 我一直在考虑学习中文。 但我不确定它是否比日语容易。

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #15
item.description:
She feels sorry that I am considering departing to a new life where I am normal.

I just want reincarnation to be real, please.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #14
item.description: Cried to my mother while talking suicide. I just wish i was real.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #13
item.description: And steve*, I want you to know this I am really proud of you. Please keep it up.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #11
item.description: Transgender Healthcare sure has a long way to go. I wish we had informed consent like they have overseas.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #10
item.description: I’ve been waiting for almost a year 😭

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #8
item.description: Two pictures I took yesterday during my walk:

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #6
item.description: I also hope to get in contact with my gender polyclinic.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #5
item.description: I’m currently running low on my medications. I have about one day left of antidepressants before I’ve ran out. Might need to call my psychiatrist / pharmacy for an emergency request. Because without those medications my life will be a living hell.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #4
item.description: It seems to have worked, I now need to revamp the webpage.

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #2
item.description: Test message, can you see me?

item.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #1
item.description: Migrate from chat id
